thread.section_title: Legend Hotel by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel - Review of Legend Hotel by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Roger C
title: Lovely hotel
text: We stayed 2 nights at the Legend Hotel and were very pleased with our choice. The hotel is in a great location for shops, good restaurants and walking distance to many interesting sights and attractions. The hotel staff were extremely courteous and helpful. The room was small but quite adequate for our needs. Good value for money and would recommend it to anyone wanting to enjoy a short break in Paris.
